testcase.classname: User use to login the Thomascook Login page
testcase.name: user navigates to the ThomasCook Loginpage
testcase.system-out: Given user is in the Thomascook page from Login.............................passed When user clicks the login button on top right corner of homepage...........passed When Again user clicks login button shows in drop down......................passed And user enters the valid email id in popup which shown.....................passed And user enters the valid password..........................................passed Then Finally user clicks the loginbutton and user in homepage of Registered user.passed
